title: Edna in the Desert
description: Edna is a precocious troublemaker wreaking havoc at her Beverly Hills school. Her therapist advocates medication, but her parents come up with an alternative cure: Edna will spend the summer in the desert with her grandparents. Their remote cabin is cut off from cell phone service, Internet and television. Ednaâ€™s determined to rebel until she meets an older local boy and falls in love for the first time. How can she get to know him from the edge of nowhere?
author: Maddy Lederman
